Univar adds Environmentally Friendly Surfactants to Product Line
<!-- -->
Univar, with one of the widest and deepest product portfolios, now adds Tomadol® Surfactants to our nationwide line up.
The Tomadol® line includes high performance, environmentally friendly surfactants for a wide variety of applications, as well as a series of linear alcohol ethoxylates ideally suited to replace NPE's in cleaning formulations.
If you have a surfactant need, we have a solution.
Convenience Service Technical Assistance Local Inventory with Prompt Deliveries Economical and Competitive
To learn more please speak with your Univar Representative or contact your nearest Univar branch. Make sure to ask how you can make the switch to Air Products, Tomadol® Surfactants.
